name: Ferndale_Espresso_Three-shelf_Bookcase
reviews: nice quality and easy to assemble

Seems very sturdy. Bought it for my son's room for storage and he likes it. I like that the shelves are adjustable. I (45y female) put it together myself in about an hour. Pretty easy. I would buy this again.

The book shelf is exactly how it appears in the picture. it is very sturdy and solid. I have it as an "entertainment center" just under my t.v. that is hung on the wall in my den and it looks perfect! I am very satisfied with this purchase!
description:
Add extra storage to your space with this three-shelf bookcase from Ferndale. This bold black bookcase with espresso finish has two adjustable shelves and comfortably holds up to 25 pounds on each shelf. Use this transitional shelving unit to store books, magazines and other display items such as collectibles and accessories.
Includes: One (1) bookcaseMaterials: Poplar, okume veneer, MDF, particle boardFinish: EspressoShelves: Two (2) adjustable shelves, one (1) fixed shelfShelf weight capacity: 25 poundsCare instructions: Wipe clean with a dry clothShelf: 11.5 inches long x 36.5 inches wideDimensions: 43 inches high x 42 inches wide x 13 inches deepStyleTransitionalMaterialMDF, Veneer, WoodFinishEspresso FinishShelf TypeBookshelves, Display, StorageAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownNumber of Shelf3Product FeaturesAdjustable Shelving
